title: 193: Overcoming Fear & Self-Doubt with Lewis Howes
description:
How do you overcome fear & self-doubt?

If you have ever asked yourself this question, you are certainly not alone. One of the challenges many of us face is the fear that we are not enough.

As a result, we live in uncertainty, sometimes with a lack of confidence that keeps us from achieving our highest potential.

Today, our extraordinary guest is Lewis Howes, a New York Times bestselling author and host of one of iTunes top-ranked podcasts, School of Greatness.

In this episode, Lewis admits that he was crippled by fear for many years until he finally had enough. He shares some of the most common fears among people and what he did to face his fears head-on.

Whether you are a student, entrepreneur, parent, or all of the above, this show is definitely for you.
